release.action: Updated class org.jdtaus.core.text.MessageEvent to support multiple messages per instance instead of just a single one.
Fixed StackOverflowErrors thrown by methods clone() and toString() of various container model classes.
Improved some container model classes to reset the internal state before throwing an IllegalArgumentException or subclasses thereof.

Added classes
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.MultiplicityConstraintException
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.PropertyOverwriteConstraintException
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.InheritanceConstraintException

Updated classes
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Specification:
    Added property multiplicity.
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Implementation:
    Added property final.
  • org.jdtaus.core.monitor.Task:
    Added properties timestamp and progressDescription and static Comparator fields ASCENDING and DESCENDING.
  • org.jdtaus.core.text.MessageEvent:
    Added constant ERROR.
  • org.jdtaus.core.io.FileOperations:
    Added constant EOF.
Updated the message of org.jdtaus.core.container.ImplementationException to contain detail information about the failed implementation.

Updated classes
  • org.jdtaus.core.io.FileOperations:
    Added method close().
  • org.jdtaus.core.io.StructuredFile:
    Added method close().
  • org.jdtaus.core.text.Message:
    Updated the Comparator implementations provided via the static ASCENDING and DESCENDING fields to additionally implement java.io.Serializable.
  • org.jdtaus.core.monitor.Task:
    Updated the Comparator implementations provided via the static ASCENDING and DESCENDING fields to additionally implement java.io.Serializable.
  • org.jdtaus.core.text.Messages:
    Added method addMessages(Message[]).

Added
  • org.jdtaus.core.lang.ExceptionEvent
  • org.jdtaus.core.lang.ExceptionEventSource
  • org.jdtaus.core.lang.ExceptionListener
Added various missing serial version UID fields for backwards compatibility. Updated to latest mojo releases.

Updated the clone() method of classes
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Dependencies
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Implementations
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Properties
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Specifications
Added missing initialization of cloned instances.

Updated methods getSpecifications(), getSpecification(String), getImplementations() and getImplementation(String) of class
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Modules
Changes of module instances were ignored.
Updated module descriptor to 1.2 model version.

Added XML schemas
  • org/jdtaus/core/model/jdtaus-core-1.0.xsd
    jDTAUS Core Model
  • org/jdtaus/core/model/container/jdtaus-container-1.0.xsd
    jDTAUS Container Model The recommended namespace prefix is "container".
  • org/jdtaus/core/model/monitor/jdtaus-monitor-1.0.xsd
    jDTAUS Monitor Model The recommended namespace prefix is "monitor".
  • org/jdtaus/core/model/text/jdtaus-text-1.0.xsd
    jDTAUS Text Model The recommended namespace prefix is "text".
Added missing version attribute to complex type Module of schema org/jdtaus/core/model/container/jdtaus-container-1.0.xsd.
Added versioning support to the container model.
Added support for messages to the container model.
Updated the container API to make use of object identity.
Updated the format of any toString method.
Moved any XML schema to the jdtaus-core-schemas artifact.

Added
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Argument
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Arguments
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.DependencyCycleException
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.DuplicateArgumentException
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.DuplicateMessageException
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.IllegalDependencyTypeException
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.IllegalPropertyTypeException
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.IncompatibleImplementationException
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Message
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Messages
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.MissingArgumentException
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.MissingMessageException
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.ModelObject
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Text

Udated
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Container
    Deprecated methods getImplementation and getDependency. Added methods getObject, getDependency(Object,String), getProperty and getMessage.
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Context
    Deprecated methods getAttribute, setAttribute and removeAttribute. Added methods getObject, setObject, removeObject and getObjectKeys
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Implementation
    Added methods getDeclaredImplementedSpecifications, getDeclaredDependencies, getDelcaredProperties. getMessages and getDeclaredMessages
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Specification
    Deprecated methods getDescription and isSingleton. Added methods getScope, isStateless and getProperties

Udated
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Container
    Added method getObject(String).

Udated
  • org.jdtaus.core.monitor.Task
    Synchronized access to a task's state correcting a long standing sporadic IllegalStateException thrown by the default task monitor implementation.

Udated
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Container
    Deprecated methods getObject(String), getObject(String,String) and getMessage(Object,String,Object). Added methods getObject(Class), getObject(Class,String) and getMessage(Object,String,Locale,Object).
  • org.jdtaus.core.container.Module
    to additionally use the version property when comparing objects using the equals method.

Updated classloading to not use the thread context classloader by default any more. Former behaviour can be enabled by setting the system property org.jdtaus.core.container.ClassLoaderFactory.enableContextClassloader to true.
Added specification meta-data for interfaces org.jdtaus.core.lang.ExceptionListener, org.jdtaus.core.monitor.TaskListener, org.jdtaus.core.text.MessageListener to the module descriptor.
Updated any references to the jDTAUS server to point to the SF.net servers.
Corrected GPG signatures.
